Data package¶

This module contains python scripts responsible for collecting data from the web using web scraping technology. We use BeautifulSoup Library to fetch the products data from supermarkets websites. Descriptions about the scripts used are as follows:

aldi_get_data.py module¶

In this file, BeautifulSoup python library gets the html content of the supermarket website. After data processing we generate a csv file containing the following informations:

  • product_name
  • price
  • image_name
  • integration_date
  • supermarket

tesco_get_data.py module¶

In this file, BeautifulSoup python library gets the html content of the supermarket website. After data processing we generate a csv file containing the following informations: product_name,price,unit,unit_price,image_name,integration_date,supermarket

  • product_name
  • price
  • unit
  • unit_price
  • image_name
  • integration_date
  • supermarket

get_imgs.py module¶

In this module, we use a python script to download the images from the supermarket's website and store them in our application.

import_csv_sqlite.py module¶

This script is resposible for the loading process. It actually store the data saved in the csv files in the SQLite database. It updates the product table with the data extracted.
